column3: Will you be registering for the next mission? If so, you will need to submit proof of purchase for a tank of ceruleum.
...Ah, a thousand pardons, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>. Due to the dangers our parties often face on these expeditions, we can accept only the most experienced individuals.
In order to embark upon an Ishgardian exploratory mission, you and your party must meet the following requirements:
※You must have completed the main scenario quest “Heavensward.”
You must be a level 60 Disciple of War or Magic.

To review your quest progression, select <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Duty<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> from the main menu, followed by <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Journal<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Wait─have you spoken with Lord Aurvael yet? I thought not. It would be best if you did so first.
What would you like to do?

Purchase <If(IntegerParameter(2))><If(LessThanOrEqualTo(IntegerParameter(2),10))><Switch(IntegerParameter(2))><Case(1)>one</Case><Case(2)>two</Case><Case(3)>three</Case><Case(4)>four</Case><Case(5)>five</Case><Case(6)>six</Case><Case(7)>seven</Case><Case(8)>eight</Case><Case(9)>nine</Case><Case(10)>ten</Case></Switch><Else/><Value>IntegerParameter(2)</Value></If><Else/><Value>IntegerParameter(2)</Value></If> of the following for <Format(IntegerParameter(3),FF022C)/> gil?
